1.content:
It was an ordinary sunday, with a nice sunny weather. It was a great day for Matt to go out and try to search a new notebook to write on. While he was walking towards their local school supplier, he saw one of his neighbors was moving and opened a garage sale for their old stuff. Matt was intrigued and wanted to take a look.

He saw an old gramophone, a gameboy, some old pc parts, a random remote control, a weird helmet, and a card deck then he though “Im pretty sure all of these are broken or just too weird to buy.”

Then his neighbor saw him and said “Can I help you Matt?, are you looking for something particular?”. Matt answered “Yes Mr. Smith, I’m looking for a good notebook to take notes on.” Mr. Smith thought a couple of seconds and told Matt to wait a second. He walked inside his home and came back with an old looking, hard covered book looking notebook. Matt really liked how it looked, his stories would look just like a real book inside this notebook.

Mr. Smith gave Matt the book and asked “Would this do?”. Matt nodded happily and said “Yes, it looks really good, what do I owe you for this?.” When Mr. Smith said Matt could take it for free, he was shocked. Then Mr. Smith smirked and said “I used that book for years, now its time for somebody else to use it. And I believe you are the right person for it. Thank you for being a really good neighbor for all these years.”

Matt smiled and thanked him again, he thought should he ask why he was leaving this neighborhood but thought it would be rude to ask what if he had financial problems and he was about to move a smaller place, he is also selling his stuff. Finally Matt decided the best action would be say his goodbye to Mr. Smith then leave.

113111211121131.title: Matt changes something before school

choices: Fast forward to the end of the orgy
1131112111211311.content:
Matt’s second class of the day was P.E. so he went to prepare for it. While he was in the mens room changing to his PE attire he thought “I could get a “Season Pass”, which would allow me to go in places where I’m not normally allowed to.” He also thought about giving himself a superpower, nothing like ability to fly or super strength. After 5 minutes of thinking he made this following entry;

“I also have a Season Pass, which allows me to go in places where I’m normally not allowed to and this is a law so nobody questions it and objects to it. And also whenever I say “Please ....” the person I said it would do that command I thought it as their own action, nobody would notice me saying “Please ...”

He wanted to test bought of these new entries so he got out of the mens room and went into the ladies. When he entered, he could see that nobody cared that he was there.

He sat down one of the banks in there and kept watching the girls changing, he shouted “Hey girls, I know you all just changed but could you all get naked and have an orgy with me.”

He still had his sex pass so they all obeyed.
1131112111211311.title: Second Class

11311121112113113.content:
After a fun day like that he was thinking how could he top this. He always walked to his home after school but today, when he gotten out of the school yard he saw Naomi waiting for him.

He went to her and asked “Hey Naomi, why are you here? Aren’t you supposed to be at work?” She explained that Jane ordered her to get a half day off from her work and made her wait for Matt. Jane wanted Naomi to give a ride to him.

Matt called the Barnes home with the hopes of getting Jane on the phone and he gotten what he wanted when Jane answered and said “Hello, this is Jane.” Matt wanted to play with her a little so he answered “Don’t you know your Master phone number by heart?” Matt was able to hear Jane’s heart beat over the phone, then he heard her answer “I’m really sorry Master, I was exercising. I wasn’t able to look at the phone number.”

Matt knew this had to be a lie but he didn’t care what she was doing so he wanted to get to the point “Jane I wan’t you to stop ordering your mother out of her job. She needs that job to satisfy your families needs.” Jane said he was right but her intentions were all positive so she simply promised to do not make the same mistake again and hang up the phone.
11311121112113113.title: Something else

choices: His mother rushed into his room, demanding an explanation
It wasn’t his mother, it was Anna searching where this noise is coming from
1133.content: The book entry only changed peoples opinions about Hanna’s occupation inside their home. They were okay her being Matt’s maid, property but all of his family still knew that they were siblings and didn’t want them having sex.
1133.title: Something Else

info.brief_description: A story where the main character locates a book which could change the reality.
info.description:
Original idea belongs to this story: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2204662-RWBY-and-the-Book-of-Reali...

Really loved the idea and wanted to create a IRL version. FEEL FREE TO ADD! 😃

Rules of the book are: The book can only have one master and if the master wishes to share responsibility they must write it in the pages. No one will be able to take the book from the master and it is indestructible. No death and no yaoi, I hate that stuff. No endings. Besides those rules anything goes in here. Now get ready for some more fun!🤩
_________________________________________________________________
Characters

Matt Brown: He is 18 and the main character of this story. He is a freshman at their local collage, he studies English Literature and he wants to become a writer. Average build, gamer, has an average social life. Occasionally he gets bullied at school.

Matt’s Family

Elizabeth Brown: She is 50 and the mother of the family, after the father of her children left them and never came back she worked really hard to look after her family. She is a really good looking mother, your best friends always describe her as “The best milf of the galaxy”. She works at the local law clinic, she had a lawyer degree but after her firstborn child she didn’t work.

Hannah Brown: The big sister of the family (25 years old), she got her good look from her mother. She always looks up to her mother and tried to help her in every turn, since her father left. When her father left she was 10 years old. She is about to finish her Engineering degree. She always had a head for the numbers, her mother always said “You must have gotten your father's mathematical talent”.

Anna Brown: The little sister of the family (8 years old), she is a typical 8-year-old. Too curious, asks too many questions.

Local Neighborhood

They live in a classic small, all friendly neighborhood.

Mr. Smith: He is a really nice and an old war veteran. He lost his wife to cancer. He always saw the positive in the world, maybe that is why he became a good writer. He had local fame because of his book about his old war memories.

David Barnes: He is 18 and he is one of the childhood friends of Matt. He has similar interests with Matt. He also has a little sister who is 12 years old.

Jane Barnes: She is the little sister (12 years old) of David. She reads a lot of books and she really likes to talk with Matt about them. Matt is really suspicious about her being in love with him.

Naomi Barnes: The mother of David. 49 years old, she still looks good for her age but not as good as Matt's mother. A redhead with an hourglass figure. She works at the same law clinic with Elizabeth.

Julia Wilson (Jules): She is 18 years old and in the same grade as Matt. They know each other pretty well, if she wasn't a lesbian Matt would have definitely given a try to become her boyfriend. She is a good looking blondie, with nerdish black glasses.

Sarah O'Ryan (Sadie): 19 years old, she was a year senior of David and Matt back in their high school. She was a pretty girl, with rich parents buying her anything she liked.
